title: API Keys
subtitle: Issue and manage keys for the Nos API.
authRequired: You need to sign in to manage API keys.

testNotice.message: This feature is currently in a test phase. If you encounter any issues or have questions, please reach out at <email>luzzo@nos.plus</email> or via <discord>Discord</discord>/<twitter>Twitter</twitter>. For higher limits, contact through the same channels.

guest.subtitle: Generate a free API key without creating an account.
guest.limit: You can create up to {limit} keys during this test phase.
guest.freeTierHint: Includes capped usage suitable for testing.
guest.managePrompt: Need higher limits or team features? Sign in to manage account-based keys.
guest.loginCta: Sign in or create an account

lookup.title: Check an API key
lookup.subtitle: Paste any NOS API key to view a read-only usage snapshot. The plaintext key is not stored.
lookup.label: Label

errors.API_KEY_REQUIRED: Enter the API key you want to inspect.
errors.LIMIT_REACHED: You’ve recently looked up a key. Please try again in a moment.
errors.LOOKUP_FAILED: Usage for that key could not be loaded.
errors.generic: Unable to verify that key right now.

newKey.title: Your new key
newKey.reminder: Copy this key now. For security reasons it won’t be shown again.

request.title: Request a key
request.subtitle: Select a tier and complete the captcha to mint a new key.
request.label: Label (optional)
request.captchaHelp: Complete the captcha below to verify you're human. The key will only be shown once, so store it safely.
request.limitReached: Maximum of {limit} keys reached. Revoke an existing key or request higher limits.

keys.title: Existing keys
keys.empty: No keys yet. Generate one above to get started.

errors.CAPTCHA_REQUIRED: Complete the captcha before requesting a key.
errors.CAPTCHA_INVALID: Captcha validation failed. Please try again.
errors.TURNSTILE_NOT_CONFIGURED: Captcha is not configured; please contact support.
errors.DUPLICATE_CLIENT: You already have a key for this account/device.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again shortly.
errors.LIMIT_REACHED: You’ve reached the maximum number of keys for this account.
errors.MAX_KEYS_REACHED: You’ve reached the maximum number of keys for this account.
errors.AUTH_REQUIRED: Please sign in to manage account keys or use the free tier above without an account.
